Uses of Interface
com.irurueta.sorting.ComparatorAndAverager

  • Uses of ComparatorAndAverager in com.irurueta.sorting

    Methods in com.irurueta.sorting with parameters of type ComparatorAndAverager
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    Sorter.median(T[] array, int fromIndex, int toIndex, ComparatorAndAverager<T> comparator)
    Computes median of provided array.
    T
    Sorter.median(T[] array, ComparatorAndAverager<T> comparator)
    Computes median of provided array Median is computed by selecting the length / 2 element, hence provided array is modified upon execution of this method containing sorted element at location length / 2, smaller unsorted elements at array[0] ... array[length / 2 - 1], and greater unsorted elements at array[length / 2 + 1] ... array[length - 1].
